p: Evidence is rapidly mounting to suggest that the severe lung damage in COVID19 is the result of both the activation of diverse limbs of host immune networks, in conjunction with exaggerated activities of each of these responses to the SARS-CoV-2 virus [ Fig. 3 ]. To more accurately account for viral induction of the coincident confluence of converging inflammatory cascades, and for differentiation of the characteristics of the immune-mediated responses in those designated to have mild versus severe COVID-19 disease, we have, for the first time to our knowledge, coined an acronym that reflects the severe magnitude and cataclysmic evolution of the severe variant of COVID-19: In essence; the PANIC Attack.
